text: Jeffrey D. Kottkamp (born November 12, 1960) is an American politician and lawyer. He was 17th Lieutenant Governor of Florida from 2007 until 2011. He is a member of the Republican Party. Kottkamp was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 2000 to 2006. He unsuccessfully ran for Florida Attorney General in 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Florida House of Representatives - Jeff Kottkamp * Jeff Kottkamp at Ballotpedia Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Florida Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Politicians from Indianapolis Category:Lawyers from Indianapolis Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Florida Legislature
title: Jeff Kottkamp
